detailsData.title: Removal Defense Expertise
detailsData.content: Our defense team will work tirelessly to ensure that your loved-one receives the most complete and thorough representation. We will review your situation and ensure that all grounds of relief are considered and heard in court.

detailsData.title: Business Immigration Services
detailsData.content: We provide legal services for companies transferring employees or recruiting talent from abroad. Our services give companies a competitive advantage in the global war for talent.

detailsData.title: Family-Based Immigration
detailsData.content: We assist individuals seeking to obtain lawful status through the sponsorship of a family member. Our services include visitor, student, and permanent resident statuses.

detailsData.title: Workforce Compliance
detailsData.content: We help companies prepare for site visits, workplace raids, and other enforcement measures. This ensures compliance with immigration laws and minimizes liabilities.

address: 7703 N. Lamar Blvd., Suite 300, Austin, TX 78752
valueProp: Since its inception, O’Connor & Associates, PLLC has focused on developing unique results-focused immigration strategies for individuals, corporations, and professionals. Whether you’re facing deportation or simply need to obtain work authorization, we will provide a service that is both personal and responsive.

testimonalData.text: Matt is my go to lawyer. He has been there for me and so many of my teammates over the years.
testimonalData.author: Dwight Gooden

testimonalData.text: Matt is a strategic thinker and really knows how to analyze and formulate a litigation game plan.
testimonalData.author: Phil Regan

testimonalData.text: I heard other players saying amazing things about Matt and now I know for myself that it's all true as he never quits until the catch is made!
testimonalData.author: Endy Chavez, NY Mets Player
